From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To display a line of status information about the current user at the top of a menu, use the **menu status-line**command in global configuration mode.

ParaDef.Info: Name of the menu this command should be applied to.

Examples: In the following example, status information is enabled for the menu named Access1:
ExtraInfo: This command displays the status information at the top of the screen before the menu title is displayed. This status line includes the router's host name, the user's line number, and the current terminal type and keymap type (if any).
